item.title: Using headless tests with Mink and Behat
item.description: Took a bit to find the right setting. The yml file should look like default:   paths:     features: 'features'   extensions:     Behat\MinkExtension\Extension:       goutte:         guzzle_parameters:           curl.options:             CURLOPT_PORT: 8000       selenium2: ~       base_url: 'http://localhost:8000'       browser_name: safari This way the goutte driver will use the correct port.
